TopicTitle: Allow the user to change contract sorting.

Articles.Content:
It would be great to allow sorting contracts by time left to complete. It is somewhat hard to understand all the information given with the current sorting. Allowing the user to click the contracts tab to sort it different ways like in Windows' file explorer(sort up/down by filename, date modified, size, etc) would make it much easier to understand.

A small change, but I think it would be beneficial.
I agree! The contract list does seem a little disorganized at the moment.

+1 support.

I would KILL for a "sort by expiration date" or "sort by funds" option.
Agree. Currently it is a little cumbersome to go through the contracts. I would love to be able to order the contracts myself so I can put the ones that I want to do first at the top.

Sorting through contracts is currently a pain in the rump. I agree 100%

I'm surprised this wasn't included in 0.24 on release, considering how much time the devs said they spent tweaking and polishing 0.24 with tester feedback. Then again, maybe the addition of the Contracts window itself was an addition that wasn't originally present in the first version of 0.24...

Regards,

Northstar

I support this suggestion.

Sometimes I would need money.

Other times I would need science.

Or I want to do missions that will give me a good reputation. (by the way, it's me or testing parts can get you more reputation than achieving orbit ?)

I suppose you could also sort by "difficulty" or "mission length" (a mission to Duna will take more time than a mission to the Mun)
